title: BloomCoreset: Fast Coreset Sampling using Bloom Filters for Fine-Grained Self-Supervised Learning
details: P Singh, G Vashishtha, ID Mastan, S Raman - arXiv preprint arXiv:2412.16942, 2024
abstract: The success of deep learning in supervised fine-grained recognition for domain- specific tasks relies heavily on expert annotations. The Open-Set for fine-grained Self- Supervised Learning (SSL) problem aims to enhance performance on downstream …
